summary:
Tony: Do you like cars?
Peter: Yeah, it was a great movie.
Tony: No, I mean are you a car person?
Peter: *confused* I'm a human.
body:
Tony: Do you like cars?

Peter: Yeah, it was a great movie.

Tony: No, I mean are you a car person?

Peter: *confused* I’m a human.

tags: why haven't I secured the bag?
summary: This is the John Harvard statue, which is actually not of John Harvard. If having a statue of you that’s not actually you is an...
caption:
This is the John Harvard statue, which is actually not of John Harvard. If having a statue of you that’s not actually you is an option, then I want the Tanya BB statue to be Beyonce, Angela Bassett, Oprah or Serena Williams. 

On Tuesday I got a chance to tour MIT’s Media Lab and it was like being in Tony Stark’s workshop for me (that’s Iron Man for you non-Marvel/superhero/comics folks). As someone with a wild imagination but no STEM background, the 💡 of being able to take one of those ideas and build it!!!!! is incredible to me. 

My interest in comedy stems from a curiosity about how, when and why we develop a sense of humor, why some things are universally funny while others aren’t, and how humor can be used to heal (the soul, the spirit and the physical body), among other things. Now, if I had some STEM skills, there are 1,000-ty ‘leven ways I could go with that.

(Not sharing my ideas because intellectual property is a thing and, who knows, maybe one day I could be a billionairess from one of them and I want everything I’m s’posed to get.)

Today I was at THE Harvard Business School (heavy emphasis on THE) – a different side of the “creation” coin but, building something (a business, a product, a fortune) is still what a lot most probably all of the HBS graduates have done. 

Anyway, in case it’s not clear, all of this is new and wondrous to me, and I am reveling in the experience. I’ll post about choosing classes later.

reblog.comment:

summary: Can somebody wright something about this? The Avengers just sitting at the compound watching a movie but Tony can´t focus on the...
body:
Can somebody wright something about this?

The Avengers just sitting at the compound watching a movie but Tony can´t focus on the movie because he can´t stop looking at Stephens hands and wondering what happend. But he doesn´t want to ask Stephen because he thinks it´s too personal too ask.

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PQ3WCE

by reidsanatomy

Peter used to love school. But now he’s closing himself off and hiding something from the people he loves. Because it’s nothing. He can handle it. It could be so much worse. It’s nothing.

blog.name: kingpepperony

blog.description:
Place for 
Pepperony shippers &

summary: You ever notice how in this scene Stane doesn't let Tony merely fall over after he paralyzed him? Nope. That bastard cradles his...
body:
Obadiah Stane

You ever notice how in this scene Stane doesn’t let Tony merely fall over after he paralyzed him? Nope. That bastard cradles his head gently and lowers him to the couch like this…

Like he was trying to be gentle with him. Like he gives a damn. This is the man Tony loved and looked up to like a father. And God. The betrayal reflected in Tony’s eyes. It is hard to watch. 😭😭😭

reblog.comment:

summary: My Best Friend's Baby
title: My Best Friend's Baby
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BZdOH9

by Snoot37

The followup story to “And the Party Continues.” Tony and Pepper have finally had their first night together. But the next morning, Tony is too hungover to remember. Hurt, Pepper was prepared to pretend it never happened and never mention it to him again. Until the positive pregnancy test. What happens when she tells Tony it was someone else?

  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Pepper Potts & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Drama & Romance


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BZdOH9

blog.name: dear-marvel-studios
blog.title: Dear Marvel Studios
blog.description:
Welcome to the HQ of the Dear Marvel Studios project, a video that will commemorate the end of 10 years of Marvel and the end of an era in the MCU. We will need a massive number of fans to take part in our video so if you're interested in having your voice heard make sure to follow this blog and keep an eye out for future posts! 
*ALL TOPICS ANNOUNCED*

summary: Calling all Marvel fans!
title: Calling all Marvel fans!
body:
Have you ever wanted to get your voice heard by the studio that runs the universe we all love? Wanted to thank them for their great work or express on opinion? Then let me introduce you to the Dear Marvel Studios project!

We plan to create a video containing fan’s thoughts on the last 10 years of the MCU, due to release a week or so before Infinity War P.2′s premier. The video would serve as a commemoration to the first 3 phases of the MCU as we move into a new era of new heroes and as an official thank you from the fans. We hope to cover a wide variety of topics in the video, from the growth of the MCU to fan-favourite moments. 

While we realize this is not an entirely original concept and similar projects have been less successful than hoped, we believe that with a structured video, good editing, strict rules about fan messages and whole lot of hard work from us and you, we can make this project a great tribute that could even get noticed by the Studio itself! And hey, even this does flop, it would be an honour to work with fellow fans to create something we can all be proud of anyway. 

We are currently in the process of perfecting a backbone script for the project (don’t worry, we’ll still need your original thoughts too!) and have a some great talents at our disposal to make this project the best it can possibly be (we may need some extra help later so consider joining the team!).

But no matter how much preparation and work our team puts in, we can’t do it without you.

Fan support and participation.

We need it guys. Without it, everything that has been planned, prepared or even thought about would be for nothing. We need every single one of you, of all ages, genders, races and sexualities. We have possibly the biggest and most diverse fanbase ever so let’s show it! We need every fan from every walk of life!

If you speak a different language and want to speak it in your message, cool! Go for it! Want to represent your small country that is never acknowledged? Nice! Can’t wait to see it! But this can’t happen unless you do it!

So if you want to show the world that you are a Marvel fan, DO IT! We also have ways to ensure your anonymity if you don’t feel comfortable showing your face online. 

If you want to get involved follow this blog (or our twitter: MarvelDear), turn on notifications and keep an eye out for future posts (it might be a while before we actually request videos but better start recruiting now!). Reblog this post too so other fans don’t miss out!

We apologise to the following blogs for tagging but as Marvel blogs with large audiences, we would greatly appreciate it if you would reblog this post to spread the word! 

@madmadmilk @holland-ish @marvel @supermoviemaniac @spideyjlaw @theageof-loki @incorrect-marvel @avengers-posts @linakova @marvelgifs @marvelhxlland @marvelxfangirl @4vengersmarvel @avengersuniverse  @marvel-is-ruining-my-life @stan-ironman @marveladdicts @bi-writes @petehparker @hollandroos @thewiseandfree @minnie-marvel @spideycity @captainsamerica @welove1stickyboi @thothollandd @stark-tony @spider-boiii @melancholland @peterparkerisntdead @frecklesholland @spidey-art @parker-peter-parker @peterpdaily @peterparker-imagines @userspidey @peterparkertbh @peter-man-homecoming @avengers-sweethearts @peterparkeristonystarksson @warletscitch @magic-marvel @lokis-helmet @lokiismineforever @thelokiimaginechronicles @oh-my-holland @the-marvel-imagines-blog @nedandpeter @peekaboo-parker @infamous-webhead @astroparker @imaginemarveluniverse @softboyhollands @hastheinfinitywartrailerreleased @imagine-loki @imaginesteverogerss @the-life-of-bucky-barnes @dailyteamcap @rogers @starspangledshitpost @stonystonysto @tony-starks-heart @steggysource @alotofmarvelanddcrelateddoodles @buckybarnesxreader @starsandstripessavedmylife @carryoncaptainrogers @frannyssquare @lokiseyebrow @asgardodinsons @mcufam @starsandsupernovae @stuckyfanart @stuckonylove @dailybuckybarnes @love-buckybarnes @gifbuckybarnes @mybuddymybucky @fuckyeahbuckybarnes @fuckyeahbuckynatasha @captainbuckybarness @storiesofthefandomlovers @peters-suit @buckysforeverprincess @buccbarnes @daughtersofthanos @lesbianpeterquill @spideyandstark @lesbiansassemble @starlord-peterquill-gotg @tomegranate-seeds @tomhollanddaily @thorgodofthundersuggestions
